Description: Gain 2 Mana. Each player (yourself included) reveals the top card of their deck and either discards it or returns it to the top of their deck.
When you gain this, you may place it on top of your deck. Gain 2 Mana
Gain 2 Mana. If this is the second time you have played Diamond Cluster this turn, gain an additional 2 Mana.
Gain 2 Mana. Gain an additional 1 Mana that can only be used to gain a spell.
Gain 3 Mana. You may discard one card from your hand. If you do, any one ally draws a card.
Gain 3 Mana. If this is the first time you have played Clouded Sapphire this turn, any one ally gains 1 charge.
